description:
Forked from the Time lapse + Digital Clock ( http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=835186492) from workshop. 
This version has centered on clock rotation effects and 竜宮 礼奈 as background by default

Sources and instructions available at https://github.com/Uwy/Waifuized-Time-Lapsed-Digital-clock so you can change everything as you please.
title: Waifuized: Time Lapse + Clock
